review: Example & Associates are very reliable lawyers. I dealt with Aaron Example directly with my car accident. He guided me with my case personally. He would answer every phone call and emails every time I have a question and/or concerns. He responded on the same day that I would contact him. We had a problem with the mechanic I personally picked and Aaron took care of the issues himself and communicated with the shop directly to smooth out the problem. They have a great staff, always accommodating and professional. I would like to thank Aaron for all the hard work and would highly recommend Example and Associates with their case/injury.
